original: Blennow, Hugo Folke Valdemar, komminister, Kallinge, f. 14/8/00 i Lö-derup, Krist. 1., av kantor Johannes B. o. Matilda Hansson. G. 24 m. Ingeborg Brandétt. Barn: Sonja f. 26, elev v. Ersta diakonissanst., Paul 27, prakt. v. Kockums Jernverk, Marta 29, kont. v. Strömsnäsbruk, Åke 31, stud. v. Fjellst. sk. i Upps., Eva 44. — Stud:ex. i Lund 18, fil. kand. 19, teol. kand. samt prästv. f. Lunds stift 23. Tjg. i V. Karleby, Loshult, Bäckebo, Mellan-Grevie o. S. Akarp, kommin. i Ronneby sed. 35. Ledare f. S:t Eginostift. ungd :gård i Saxemara. Skr.: Livet med Gud, Jesu efterföljel-se. Bibelregister, Icke allena, Jesus är min vän den bäste, Låten barnen komma till mig, I nöd och lust. O, död, var är din udd, Han ej din sjuksäng överger, Kallinge kyrkokrönika 37-46, Blekinge kyrkokrönika 43-46. Hobby: bordtennis.
translated: Blennow, Hugo Folke Valdemar, vicar, Kallinge, born on August 14th, 1900 in Löderup, Kristianstad, to organist Johannes B. and Matilda Hansson. Married on June 24th to Ingeborg Brandétt. Children: Sonja born in 1926, a student at Ersta Deaconess Institute, Paul born in 1927, working at Kockums Jernverk, Marta born in 1929, working in administration at Strömsnäsbruk, Åke born in 1931, studying at Fjellst. school in Uppsala, Eva born in 1944. He graduated from Lund University with a degree in philosophy in 1918, a Bachelor of Arts in 1919, and a Bachelor of Theology. He was ordained as a priest for the Lund diocese in 1923. He served in West Karleby, Loshult, Bäckebo, Mellan-Grevie, and S. Akarp before becoming vicar in Ronneby in 1935. He was a leader for the S:t Eginostift Ungdomsgård in Saxemara. He has written several books including "Life with God", "Following Jesus", "Bible Register", "Not Only Me, Jesus is My Best Friend", "Let the Children Come to Me", "In Sickness and in Health", "Death, Where is Your Sting?", and "He Will Never Leave Your Sickbed." He also wrote the Kallinge Church Chronicle from 1937 to 1946 and the Blekinge Church Chronicle from 1943 to 1946. His hobby was table tennis.

author.name: Not Only Me, Jesus is My Best Friend
Let the Children Come to Me
He Will Never Leave Your Sickbed
